name: Roblox Night Funkin' [MOD]
description:
Short Description:

 Roblox Night Funkin' Mod - this is a mod for FNF with Roblox player texture (Player username - sebka228PRO), and with edited UI, Music and Gameplay.  

       Mod is on Open-Alpha stage, so there are some bugs.

Full Description:

Roblox Night Funkin' Mod have 30% of original FNF, and 70% modded. The mod is on Open-Alpha stage, so there are bugs, crushes and bad-quality images. Now mod is free, but when I finish do this mod, You need to pay min. $1.99. Why is it free now? Because paying for a version that is in development and has a bunch of bugs, you have to be some kind of mentally retarded. Enjoy the free demo for now. I ask you to write all errors in the comments, if you download this version, you will automatically become a tester who can write an error and not go unnoticed. If you give me a super bug that infuriates everyone, then you will receive a free full version when the game is no longer in development. Otherwise, if you tell us about an obvious mistake, you will get a version with 4 weeks and 5 songs, but with all textures, etc. 

Email for communication - gekteamcontact@gmail.com

So download it and enjoy. GB :) When the full version comes out and you want to get your money back, write to us by emai. if the game was purchased less than 14 days ago, then we will consider this case. We are forced to refuse you for various reasons, for example: you want to request a refund already 2 times, or the game was purchased 15 days ago, there are many reasons, we will indicate them in an email. Х
